SupportPage.seo.title: Support & Collaboration | HeyTCM
SupportPage.seo.description: Join HeyTCM to advance intelligent TCM together. We welcome your support and collaboration.

SupportPage.seo.og.description: Join HeyTCM to advance intelligent TCM together. We welcome your support and collaboration.
SupportPage.head.title: HeyTCM - Support Us
SupportPage.banner.title: Support & Collaboration
SupportPage.ldjson.name: Support & Collaboration | HeyTCM
SupportPage.ldjson.description: Join HeyTCM to advance intelligent TCM together. We welcome your support and collaboration.

SupportPage.ldjson.software.name: HeyTCM Intelligent TCM Platform
SupportPage.ldjson.software.description: An intelligent health management cloud platform combining TCM theory with modern technology, supporting multi-terminal, data analysis, and personalized health services.
featureList: TCM constitution analysis and health advice
Personalized health reports and trend analysis

SupportPage.intro: The road to 'carrying on the lost knowledge of the sages' is full of challenges and requires continuous data accumulation and funding. This is not pure charity, but a value exploration that needs your participation. Every bit of your support is a light for the future of TCM.

SupportPage.otherWays.title: Share & Spread
SupportPage.otherWays.description: Recommend HeyTCM to friends, share your experience, and expand the community's influence.

SupportPage.otherWays.title: Play Games (Watch Ads)
SupportPage.otherWays.description: Watch ads while playing TCM games, and each view contributes a small amount of funding to the project.

SupportPage.otherWays.title: Join Community Discussions/Maintenance
SupportPage.otherWays.description: Answer questions, participate in discussions, maintain community atmosphere, and help new users.

SupportPage.otherWays.title: Join Open Source Development
SupportPage.otherWays.description: Contribute code, fix bugs, develop new features, and improve product quality.

SupportPage.otherWays.title: Contribute Health Data
SupportPage.otherWays.description: Share your health data safely and anonymously to support research and algorithm optimization.

SupportPage.otherWays.title: Participate in Research Projects
SupportPage.otherWays.description: Join as a volunteer in various research experiments to validate product effectiveness.

SupportPage.cta.title: Become a HeyTCM Collaborator
SupportPage.cta.description: Whether you are a user, developer, or researcher, your support and participation are vital to the advancement of intelligent TCM.
SupportPage.selectedPlanDesc: Thank you for supporting HeyTCM! Click the button below to complete payment and start your journey into intelligent TCM.
SupportPage.volunteerDesc: We need talents from technology, content, operations, medicine, and other fields to join us in building a bright future for intelligent TCM.
SupportPage.testimonialsDesc: Hear what our HeyTCM supporters have to say
SupportPage.testimonials1Desc: As a TCM doctor, I'm glad to see someone trying to quantify TCM theory with modern technology. HeyTCM's data visualization helps my patients better understand Qi & Blood changes, improving treatment compliance.
SupportPage.testimonials2Desc: My whole family uses HeyTCM products. As an engineer, I appreciate its open-source philosophy. My parents weren't interested in health management before, but now, through gamification, they're very interested in traditional health knowledge.
